    Summarize taxon profiles analyses

    make_summary.Rd

    Produce summary tables and plots of the demographic analyses made for all species

    make_summary(
  AnalysisDir,
  SaveDir,
  namefile = "",
  taxaList = "Mammalia",
  BySex = list(Mammalia = c("Male", "Female")),
  Sections = c("sur", "rep", "gro")
)

    Arguments

    AnalysisDir

    character directory where to find the .Rdata files

    SaveDir

    character directory where to save summary plots and tables

    namefile

    character Suffix to add to the name of files produced if needed. Default = ""

    taxaList

    vector of character names of the taxa studied. Default= "Mammalia"

    BySex

    list of the taxa names indicating the sexes analyzed. Default=list(Mammalia = c("Male", "Female"))

    Sections

    vector of character names of the sections to update in the taxon profile results: "sur", "rep" and/or "gro". Default = c("sur", "rep", "gro")

    Value

    It saves summary tables and plots for each Sections and a general summary table. It returns the main summary table

    Examples

    file = system.file("sci_Animal.csv", package = 'ISRverse')
AnalysisDir  = paste0(dirname(file),'\\Rdata')
SaveDir = paste0(tempdir(check = TRUE),'\\temp')
dir.create(SaveDir)

SummTab <- make_summary(AnalysisDir, SaveDir,
               taxaList = "Reptilia",
               BySex = list(Reptilia = c("Male", "Female")) ,
               Sections = c("sur", 'gro')
)
#> 
#>  Reptilia  -------Species:  Testudo hermanni Progress: 100 %
list.files(SaveDir)
#> [1] "Growth_error.pdf"   "SRGs_Analyses.csv"  "SRGs_Growth.csv"   
#> [4] "SRGs_Survival.csv"  "Survival_error.pdf"

unlink(SaveDir, recursive = TRUE)
